CodeBlockMethod.Name: InitiateGame
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
-- Test OK
self.player = player self.endGameFlag = false -- 말 pieces에 추가
self:SetPieces()
self.canPushThrowButton = true

CodeBlockMethod.Name: ClearGame
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
log("clear game called")
self.player = nil self.endGameFlag = true self.canPushThrowButton = false self.canPieceSelected = false for k, v in pairs(self.pieces) do v.currentPosition = 0 table.remove(self.pieces, k)
-- 말 위치 초기화 end
self.endGameFlag = true

CodeBlockMethod.Name: SetPieces
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local piece1 = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/mainmap/PieceModel") local piece2 = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/mainmap/PieceModel_1") local piece3 = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/mainmap/PieceModel_2")
piece1.PieceComponent.pieceNumber = 1 piece2.PieceComponent.pieceNumber = 2 piece3.PieceComponent.pieceNumber = 3
if _PosData.first <= 20 then table.insert(self.pieces, piece1.PieceComponent) end
if _PosData.second <= 20 then table.insert(self.pieces, piece2.PieceComponent) end
if _PosData.third <= 20 then table.insert(self.pieces, piece3.PieceComponent) end
